name: Protect and Serve
description:
As Secret service you must protect the President at all cost! (Even if they decide to walk obliviously in a straight line!) So to protect him you take to the sky with your sniper. Be your President's eyes and look out for obstacles that could harm him. Deal with such obstacles by shooting them with your sniper! How long can you keep up the fight?!

This Game was created for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam by Kyle Addy and Garry Stanfill

Controls:

Shoot: Left Mouse Button

Developer High Score: 545 (Leave us a comment on what you reached!)
